list.title: Aberdeen Oak Plank 12mm
list.body_plain_text: Aberdeen Oak is a beautiful 12mm laminate. It has a v-groove on all four sides, which gives it that realistic wood floor appearance. The integrated click-fit system allows for easy installation. The AC4 rating makes this floor suitable for heavy domestic and medium commercial use. Aberdeen Oak has a medium embossed surface which gives it an authentic textured finish. This decor has a natural oak look in a light brown colour with dark pores. The wood grain helps to give it that natural style.
list.body:
Aberdeen Oak (12mm)

Aberdeen Oak is a 12mm laminate floor with a very authentic look and feel. The boards are bevelled and come with a click-fit system for easy installation.

The AC4 rating makes this floor suitable for heavy domestic and medium commercial use.

The medium embossed finish gives the floor a textured feel.

PRODUCT BENEFITS

  • Durable - resistant to stains, impacts and scratches
  • Hygienic - quick to clean and suitable for allergies
  • Swift installation - easy-to-install click fit system
  • Suitable for underfloor heating
  • Environmentally-friendly

list.title: Chantilly Oak Long 12mm
list.body_plain_text:
Chantilly Oak Long is a 12mm laminate with a v-groove on all four sides, giving it that wood floor appearance. The AC5 rating makes this floor suitable for heavy usage in both domestic and commercial settings.
The integrated click-fit system allows for quick and easy installation, while the authentic embossed surface creates a realistic look and feel. 
The hand scraped finish gives the floor a natural, worn look which is ideal for creating a vintage style in your home. This popular style has long been in fashion because it expresses the precious marks of time. The light shades in the Chantilly Oak will brighten up your room and make it appear more spacious. This laminate is part of the long plank collection, which means that it is almost twice the length of standard laminates. It is ideally suited to larger rooms to maximise the long plank effect. Also available in a 10mm AC4 shortboard format - see 5953.
list.body:
Chantilly Oak Long (12mm)

Chantilly Oak Long is a 12mm laminate floor with a very authentic look and feel. The boards are bevelled and come with a click-fit system for easy installation.

The AC5 rating makes this floor suitable for heavy usage in both domestic and commercial settings.

The authentic embossed finish gives the floor a textured look and feel.

The light shades in the Chantilly Oak will brighten up your room and make it appear more spacious. Ideally suited to larger rooms to maximise the long plank effect.

Also available in a 10mm AC4 shortboard format - see 5953.

PRODUCT BENEFITS

  • Durable - resistant to stains, impacts and scratches
  • Hygienic - quick to clean and suitable for allergies
  • Swift installation - easy-to-install click fit system
  • Suitable for underfloor heating

list.body:
Historic Oak (12mm)

Historic Oak is a 12mm laminate floor with a very authentic look and feel. The boards are bevelled and come with a click-fit system for easy installation.

The AC5 rating makes this floor suitable for heavy usage in both domestic and commercial settings.

The medium embossed finish gives the floor a textured feel.

PRODUCT BENEFITS

  • Durable - resistant to stains, impacts and scratches
  • Hygienic - quick to clean and suitable for allergies
  • Swift installation - easy-to-install click fit system
  • Suitable for underfloor heating
  • Environmentally-friendly

list.title: Icelandic Oak Herringbone
list.body_plain_text: Icelandic Oak Herringbone is a contemporary 12mm laminate herringbone. The herringbone pattern gives you that elegant and exclusive look but for only a fraction of the cost of a real wood floor. It has a v-groove on all four sides, which gives it that realistic wood floor appearance. The integrated click-fit system allows for easy installation, while the AC4 rating makes this floor suitable for heavy domestic and medium commercial use. The white decor is well-suited to modernistic and Scandinavian-style designs.
list.body:
Icelandic Oak Herringbone (12mm)

Icelandic Oak is a 12mm laminate herringbone floor with a very authentic look and feel. The boards are bevelled and come with a click-fit system for easy installation.

The AC4 rating makes this floor suitable for heavy domestic and medium commercial use.

Also available in a plank version - Icelandic Oak Plank (0012).

PRODUCT BENEFITS

  • Durable - resistant to stains, impacts and scratches
  • Hygienic - quick to clean and suitable for allergies
  • Swift installation - easy-to-install click fit system
  • Suitable for underfloor heating
  • Environmentally-friendly
